author: mearaftadewos
title: Cashout and Buy ADA in Ethiopia
description: In Ethiopia, people can't buy or cash out ADA easily. There is also no ADA payment ways and cardano users in Ethiopia, only few in Africa
solution: A service where people can buy and cash out ADA in local currency to enjoy thier investment returns and pay with thier ADA.
